title: Welcome

home.title: Welcome,
home.paragraph_1: Thank you for participating in this study which focuses on alphanumeric sequence inputs on the Internet.
home.paragraph_2:
Your task will be to copy, as quickly as possible and without error, a series of 18 numbers and letters that will be presented to you at the top of your screen.
You will have to copy these numbers and letters into one or more empty fields displayed in the middle of the screen.
home.paragraph_3:
Note that when you finish typing the 18th character, you will automatically move to a short questionnairy that will collect your feedback on how the information was presented and your typing experience.

After this questionnairy, you will move to a new input screen, then again to a short questionnairy and so on.... Until you reach the 16th round.

The alphanumeric sequence to be recopied will be different each time (it is randomly generated by the system).
home.paragraph_4:
The whole duration of the study is expected to be 4-5 minutes.
Before you begin, please fill in some information about yourself...

user_infos.errors_in_form: Please fill out the following fields.

sexe.is_required: Please fill in the field concerning your gender.

age.is_required: Please fill in the field concerning your age.

any_experience.any_experience: Do you ever have to enter alphanumeric information (numbers and letters) on the Internet, such as an ID, an order number, a contract number, etc.?

experience_grade.question: When you have to enter alphanumeric information on the Internet, how would you describe the experience in general?

familirization_page.here_an_example: Here is an example of a screen that will be presented to you during the study.
familirization_page.instructions: Instruction: Please copy, as quickly as possible and without error, the alphanumeric sequence in the empty field(s) below.

experience_beginning.title: Welcome
experience_beginning.start_if_you_are_ready: When you are ready, click on the "Begin" button.

post_experience.title: What do you think about this kind of presentation and way of entering this string?
